subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] My

full_text:
What free energy machines did they try to build? There are hundreds of
different ideas, designs and concepts out there.

If it was John Bedini's, I don't doubt it.

Zack

>  Well as a great lover of Radio Shack's various projects (150 in 1 was my
> fave), I'm pretty sure you will not be able to build a sweeping AM radio
> from that.  Sorry.  But they are great to learn basic principles from.
>
> Also while the jury is still out on whether or not free energy machines
> exist, it is definitely not going to be able to be built using a radio shack
> learning lab.  Otherwise everyone would have one by now and we would not
> need the power companies.
>
> Don
